title:
Is it possible to find out what percent or the total dollars that were collected from a  local raffle? 



 I gave 100.00 to what I thought was a Wounded Warrior Raffle at  Carolina Beach . The day of the raffle there were very conservative political books for sale and part of the collected monies went to a local christian school.  



I would like to know  much money was raised and how it was divided.



Thank you,
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4224
